patthana15.64:1.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Narūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.64:2.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ dve paccayavasena.)
